knimeNode.name: PNN Predictor
knimeNode.shortDescription: Applies unknown data to a Probabilistic Neural Network (PNN).

fullDescription.intro: The first input port contains the test data while the second one contains the PNN Model to which the data is applied. The output data has one additional column containing the predicted class attribute.
fullDescription.option: The name of the predicted column appended to the end of the test data.

A probability between 0.0 and 1.0. Instances where the activation lies above this threshold are classified as a missing (unknown) class. This is useful in cases where the feature space is not completely covered by rules.

ports.dataIn: Test data must have same column names and types as the PNN model.
ports.dataOut: Test data with one additional column appended.
ports.modelIn: PNN model used to classify the test data.
